reviews.review: 好玩，太刺激辣！我无法自拔！

Absolute shithole of a game , wouldn't recommend to anyone . Legit feels like this game is still in alpha or is just a concept . Full of bugs and exploits , and as a killer , if the survivors have more than 3 neurons they can run you around all game long and that's the gameplay basically , stuck behind a running survivor for 3 minutes bcs you have to wait for bloodlust to kick in and give you a speed boost . Don't even get me started on flashlights and how easy it is to literally turn any killer into a hostile npc at best . Unless you get this dump for free on epic games or even on steam , don't buy it , you'll get bored in 3 days max

Recommend if you love co op and multiplayer horror games or just horror games in generel

(Time on here does not reflect my actual experience)

Very Very epic game. You can play a a bald man wearing a bright red shirt with a big chicken on it while running around in circles getting chased by an ever more angry growing Micheal Myers who has been chasing you for 5 generators. Afterwards you can proceed to obnoxiously blind him with a consumer grade flashlight until he leaves.

(Edit) - After June 22nd mid chapter update, I can no longer recommend this game until they do something about the heavy imbalance in the game.

I love horror and thriller films, and being able to play DBD honestly makes me the happiest person in the world. I may have lost my voice a few times from squeaking and screaming to much, but I love it and don't see this ever getting old for me.

I am a 71 year old single father of a 2 year old son. My wife died in a horrible train crash, I never wanted to look into the details but it had something to do with a kitty chewing the tracks and the train derailing and she died painfully and horribly. This was 5 years ago and I had my son with a lady i cheated on her with before and after she died. I never understood kids' taste in video games. I supposed I am a bit washed up, still caught on old classics forgotten by time that this newer generation will never remember, much less cherish (such as five nights at freddys). I got this game because I heard it was fun with friends and I wanted to socialise more with my son especially in the light of the recent Texas event that had to do with a school (my son is a complete social outcast). We started playing and queued up as survivors. He picked Bill from the popular franchise "left 4 bad" and I picked David King. Within the first few matches, I learned that David is gay which deeply unsettles me and I also got death threats for using one of his unique perks. Eventually, after my son's bedtime, I decided to play killer and, as soon as i opened the lobby screen for killer my wife came back from the dead and in an eternal act of kindness characteristic to her she told me that this game sucks and to uninstall it. That was my experience, I hope yours can differ if you decide to play this.
excelnte

A very fun and exciting "Thriller" and "Killer" game. Graphically it's good, mechanically it is fine. I haven't encountered a single bug yet (So they have been working on the game for a while). The characters are all interesting, especially the killers!

It's kind of like Among Us, except your playing people and monsters... and there is a lot more blood, gore and violence... lots of screaming too. If your fear receptors have not been blunted beyond repair, then this game will definitely give you a good fright!

Of course... if you just like to kill, maim and spread terror... I don't think I have played a game that gave me such a thrill like this in a long time... something about chasing a survivor until he lands in my bear trap, frightened and waiting for my blade to shred his flesh is awfully satisfying... my god... what is this game doing to me.

Tengo que reinstalarlo constantemente porque por alguna razón cada tanto se queda la pantalla en negro luego de trailer del nuevo DLC, es un fastidio y bastante molesto. Además la gente no dice gg al finalizar una partida, tremenda falta de respeto
